snippet: Astronomy faculty at the University of California, Berkeley, called on the administration to reconsider its approach to Dr. Marcy, who was found in a university investigation to have sexually harassed students.
abstract: Astronomy faculty members at University of California, Berkeley, say colleague Geoffrey Marcy should step down; he was found in university investigation to have sexually harassed students, and placed upon probation.
lead_paragraph: Astronomy faculty at the University of California, Berkeley, called on the administration to reconsider its approach to Dr. Marcy, who was found in a university investigation to have sexually harassed students.

headline.print_headline: Berkeley Faculty Call for Firing of Astronomer Found Guilty of Harassment
headline.main: Geoffrey Marcy’s Berkeley Astronomy Colleagues Call for His Dismissal
